nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely. Cloudy, with a low around 26. North wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 30. North wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow between 8pm and 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 25. North wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 11am. Cloudy, with a high near 36. Northeast wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow. Cloudy, with a low around 28. Northeast wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow. Cloudy, with a high near 33. North wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 4 to 8 inches possible.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. Northwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 34. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 15. West wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. Southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 8pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 29. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 43. Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 5am, then a chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 29. West wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Friday

nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 9am, then a chance of rain. Mostly sunny, with a high near 39. Northwest wind around 9 mph.
